tests.query: CREATE TABLE merge_tree_table1 (`s` LowCardinality(String), x UInt32) ENGINE = MergeTree ORDER BY x settings index_granularity = 1;
tests.name: 01514_empty_buffer_different_types.sql

tests.query: CREATE TABLE buffer_table1 ( `s` String , x UInt32) ENGINE = Buffer(currentDatabase(), 'merge_tree_table1', 16, 10, 60, 10, 1000, 1048576, 2097152);
tests.name: 01514_empty_buffer_different_types.sql

tests.query: select s from buffer_table1 where x = 1;
tests.name: 01514_empty_buffer_different_types.sql

tests.query: select s from buffer_table1 where x = 2;
tests.name: 01514_empty_buffer_different_types.sql
